name: AOD Marketing
description:
AOD is a Montreal-based web marketing agency with over ten years of experience in creating dynamic, custom strategies in 3+ languages for its local and international clients. Founded in 2009, AOD has a developed global understanding of the web marketing industry.
With its experts from all facets of web marketing including SEO, PPC, web analytics and social media, we focuses on forging win-win relationships with all of its stakeholders.
